title: Aminocyclopropenium as a novel hydrogen bonding organocatalyst for cycloaddition of carbon disulfide and epoxide to prepare cyclic dithiocarbonate
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,10378-10389
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00937A, Paper

The hybrid H-bond donor cyclopropenium was vital in activating the epoxide and stabilizing the anion intermediate.
